questions.question: In "Star Trek", what is the Klingon death ritual?
questions.correct_answer: Look into sky and yell loudly in mourning.
incorrect_answers: Kiss the jagged forehead before burial.
Shoot into space in a torpedo casing.
Split the deceased's earnings between bloodkin.
